Hero.description: Introducing Handleit, an AI-powered iOS keyboard app revolutionizing your communication. With intelligent reply suggestions, Handleit enables swift, effortless responses in any language.

SocialProof.maker: Join the community of communicators who type smarter, not harder.

Pricing.title: Flexible Pricing for Everyone
Pricing.title2: Choose the Plan That's Right for You.
Pricing.description: Whether you're an individual looking to enhance your typing experience or an enterprise seeking efficient communication solutions, Handleit offers competitive pricing tailored to your needs.

enterprise.title: Enterprise Solutions
enterprise.description: For enterprise solutions and private deployments, please contact us for customized pricing options tailored to your organization's specific needs.

Pricing.follow: Stay updated with our latest features on Twitter.

WallOfLove.title: Love from Our Users
WallOfLove.description1: Your support and feedback on Twitter inspire us. If you've enjoyed using Handleit,
WallOfLove.description2: we'd love to hear from you
WallOfLove.description3: . Your tweet could be featured here, showcasing how Handleit has transformed your typing experience.

FAQ.title: Have Questions?
FAQ.description: We've compiled answers to some of your most common questions about Handleit.
